text: Pedro Fernando Rios Soares Ramos, known as Rios (born 14 September 1983 in Trofa), is a Portuguese retired footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. ==External links== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Trofa Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:LigaPro players Category:Portuguese Second Division players Category:C.D.
